programme.title: The first Letter from America 1946
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke re-presents his first American Letter.
programme.medium_synopsis: On the 50th anniversary of his Letter from America broadcasts Alistair Cooke re-presents the first talk, describing his return from an austere Britain to a bountiful New York.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
